strapiPost.title: Celebrate Cinco De Mayo With HWOA At The Jones Center
strapiPost.content:
Join the Hispanic Women's Organization of Arkansas for the Annual Cinco de Mayo Festival at the Jones Center in Springdale on Saturday, May 6, from 12-7p.

  • Fiesta de la victoria: Cinco de Mayo commemorates the historical Mexican victory over the French at the Battle of Puebla on May 5, 1862. The festival will include entertainment, live music, delicious food, dance, a fashion show, and much more!
  • For a great cause: All proceeds generated from the festival go towards the HWOA Scholarship Fund, which provides financial assistance and guidance for students and their families through the process of pursuing higher education. 

Learn more about HWOA's Cinco de Mayo Festival HERE.
